name: UnconstrainedBox
desc: A widget that imposes no constraints on its child, allowing it to render at its "natural" size.

fields.name: textDirection
fields.desc: The text direction to use when interpreting the [alignment] if it is an [AlignmentDirectional].

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: The alignment to use when laying out the child.

fields.name: constrainedAxis
fields.desc: The axis to retain constraints on, if any.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.
